A

ack() - Method in class org.gruth.tools.SingleTestReport
to be used to force the current instance to return a boolean to an invoking java assert statement.
ack(boolean) - Method in class org.gruth.tools.SingleTestReport
this method is useful to use with java assert statements: it forces a boolean return value for the current instance and this value will be used by the assert.

SingleTestReport - Class in org.gruth.tools

yield() - Method in class org.gruth.tools.SingleTestReport

yield(boolean) - Method in class org.gruth.tools.SingleTestReport
